content: For a small seminar in Bonn I'm also working on Fourier analysis with some students. The focus for this seminar is on Plancherel's theorem and the (real and complex) interpolation theorems. I think it's mostly disjoint from the Fourier analysis done in PNT+, but it might be good to check that we're not duplicating work. The (at the moment very bare-bones) repository is here: https://github.com/fpvandoorn/BonnAnalysis/
